titles.title: FTC Integrity Act
FTC Integrity Act
A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to establish procedures for the treatment of votes by departed Commissioners.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
FTC Integrity Act
This bill prohibits votes on motions cast by commissioners of the Federal Trade Commission from having any effect after they leave the Commission if the voting has not closed before end of the commissioners' last day of service. The bill applies retroactively to any vote taken on or after January 1, 2021.
